name: HMEventTriggerActivationState
desc: The activation state of an event trigger.

items.name: case disabledNoCompatibleHomeHub
items.desc: Trigger is not active because there is no compatible home hub.

items.name: case disabledNoHomeHub
items.desc: Trigger is not active because there is no home hub.

items.name: case disabledNoLocationServicesAuthorization
items.desc: Trigger is not active because the user has not authorized use of location services.
